name: C4/C5 Nerve Root Injury Recovery Plan
goal: Restore biceps functionality and arm mobility post-C5 nerve root injury
exercises: [{'id': 'ex-arm-raises', 'name': 'Assisted Arm Raises', 'description': 'Raise the arm with assistance to shoulder height.', 'phase': 'early', 'body_part': 'upper arm', 'nerve_target': 'C5', 'sets': 3, 'reps': 10, 'duration_seconds': None, 'equipment': ['strap', 'table'], 'instructions': 'Use a strap or therapist assistance to raise arm slowly.', 'contraindicated_for': ['active shoulder dislocation'], 'requires_supervision': True}, {'id': 'ex-biceps-curl', 'name': 'Supported Biceps Curl', 'description': 'Seated biceps curls using light resistance or gravity-eliminated setup.', 'phase': 'mid', 'body_part': 'biceps', 'nerve_target': 'C5', 'sets': 2, 'reps': 8, 'duration_seconds': None, 'equipment': ['cuff weights', 'mirror'], 'instructions': 'Perform curl motion while observing form in mirror.', 'contraindicated_for': [], 'requires_supervision': False}]
